sentence_summaries.sentence_text: most graphics systems i have seen have drawing routines that also specify a color for drawing like <UNK> x y color or <UNK> x1 y1 x2 y2 color or <UNK> x1 y1 x2 y2 color with x i have to do something like xsetforeground current color <UNK> d w x
why did x designers decide to not associate the color with the object being drawn and instead associate it with the display it is being drawn on
